      • TIME_CONSTRAINED

        public static final boolean TIME_CONSTRAINED
        Indicates if the overspend should be taken into account or not. Time limits are WALL TIME on Windows, because CPU TIME is not accurate enough at the level of milliseconds on this OS.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
